channel.title: Multilingua
channel.description: A RSS feed containing the latest articles published in Multilingua

item.description: Article by Judit Kroo DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/multi-2023-0073

item.title: The slowness of language, the speed of capital: conflicting temporalities of the “green transition” in the Swedish north
item.description: Article by Judit Kroo DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/multi-2024-0076

item.title: Deaf migrants in Sweden: exploring linguistic and bureaucratic challenges through the lens of Crip Theory and Crip Linguistics

item.title: What is a dialect? What is a standard?: shifting indexicality and persistent ideological norms
